metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Using snakeYAML to parse untrusted YAML files may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stackoverflow.

criterions.comment: snakeyaml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
